name: Table For Two
description:
Made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam. 

Welcome to your corporate nightmare :) 

You, Minnie Mum Wage, have fallen upon hard times, and you're balancing two jobs to stay afloat: the first, as a waitress as a steakhouse, and the second, as a waitress in a maid cafe. Today you were mistakenly put down for a shift at both establishments — at the same time. 

Dash between both restaurants, keep your customers happy, make sure you're wearing the right uniform, and remember to smile! 

OR ELSE. 

Meet the team!

  • Natasha Badami, Programming @nbadami
  • Ahmad Faiyaz, Music & Audio @vandager
  • Dilan Huang, Cover Art
  • Valerie Matula, Concept Art
  • Kaavya Ramachandhran, Character & Background Art @kapitha
  • Naveen Sabharwal, Programming @navelsaber
  • Brandon Fox, Programming
